short_summary: Supply of office furniture to Thunder Bay, Ontario
description: The Government of Canada requires the supply, delivery and installation of office furniture to Thunder Bay, Ontario, as part of the Public Prosecution Service of Canada.
full_summary:
# Tender Notice: Office Furniture Acquisition

**Reference Number:** cb-443-56790812
**Amendment Number:** 5
**Solicitation Number:** 1000032961
**Publication Date:** January 15, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** February 2, 2024, at 2:00 PM
**Amendment Date:** February 2, 2024
**Expected Contract Start Date:** February 15, 2024
**Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2024
**Tender Status:** Expired

## Notice Information

This tender notice is for a request for proposal (RFP) procurement method. The Public Prosecution Service of Canada (PPSC) requires the acquisition of office furniture for its location in Thunder Bay, Ontario.

## Procurement Details

* **Product Category:** Office furniture, including interconnecting panels and freestanding systems, freestanding height-adjustable desk/table products, metal filing and storage cabinets, and support space-collaborative furniture.
* **Delivery Address:** Thunder Bay, Ontario.
* **Expected Delivery Date:** Before March 31, 2024.
* **Procurement Strategy:** The procurement is set aside for Indigenous businesses under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business.
* **Trade Agreements:** Not applicable due to the set-aside for Indigenous businesses.

## Attachment Information

The following documents are available:

* [Thunder Bay Office Furniture RFP](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29469/rfb_2023-a000195-thunder-bay-office_new-furniture_amendment-001_0.pdf)
* [Thunder Bay Office Furniture RFP Revised Furniture Plan](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29469/thunder-bay---rfb_ias---furniture-plan-revised_plan-detage-revise.pdf)
* [Thunder Bay Office Furniture RFP Revised Open Area Plan](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29469/thunder-bay---rfb_ias---open-area-plan-revised_espace-ouverte-plan-revise.pdf)

## Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

* Name: Jessica Roy-Labelle
* Email: jessica.roy-labelle@ppsc-sppc.gc.ca
* Phone: (343) 550-970
